Package Server

Class EkrutServer

java.lang.Object
ocsf.AbstractServer
Server.EkrutServer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class EkrutServer extends AbstractServer
This class extends the abstract server class from the OCSF framework, starts the server instance and implements function from the abstract server to run and maintain the server, deal with clients connections and requests. (receive and send messages)
